name: Land Registrer
detail: He is the person in charge of establishing documents related to the ownership of a land like the Certificate of Ownership and the Final Land Title

name: Notary
detail: He acts as a judge in front of whom the land buyer and land seller sign a contract stipulating that they are both agreeing

name: Land Surveyor
detail: He is in charge of getting the exact coordinates of a piece of land and establishing the technical file

name: Land Owner
detail: This is the person that wants to sell out his piece of land to another person

name: Land Buyer
detail: This is the person under whose name a new land title is established because he is the buyer

name: FragMark
detail: The Web app which will permit us ton establish a land title and verify coordinates based on this procedue only
